item.title: Report: Apple Discussed Buying Mistral AI and Perplexity
item.description: Apple executives have reportedly discussed acquiring Mistral AI and Perplexity, The Information reports. Services chief Eddy Cue is apparently the most vocal advocate of a deal to buy AI firms to bols
